name: item_blink
des_item: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

method_active.des_active: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.

name: item_blades_of_attack
des_item: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

name: item_broadsword
des_item: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

name: item_chainmail
des_item: A medium weave of metal chains.

name: item_claymore
des_item: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

name: item_helm_of_iron_will
des_item: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

name: item_javelin
des_item: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage.

name: item_mithril_hammer
des_item: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

name: item_platemail
des_item: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

name: item_quarterstaff
des_item: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

name: item_quelling_blade
des_item: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

method_active.des_active: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.

method_passive.des_passive: Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

name: item_faerie_fire
des_item: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

method_active.des_active: Consume the Faerie Fire to instantly restore 75 health

name: item_infused_raindrop
des_item: Elemental protection from magical assaults.

method_passive.des_passive: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage. Comes with 5 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

name: item_wind_lace
des_item: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

name: item_ring_of_protection
des_item: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

name: item_stout_shield
des_item: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

method_passive.des_passive: Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: item_moon_shard
des_item: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

method_active.des_active: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 150 night vision. Does not stack

method_passive.des_passive: Grants 300 bonus night vision.

name: item_gauntlets
des_item: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

name: item_slippers
des_item: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses

name: item_mantle
des_item: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

name: item_branches
des_item: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

method_active.des_active: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

name: item_belt_of_strength
des_item: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

name: item_boots_of_elves
des_item: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

name: item_robe
des_item: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

name: item_circlet
des_item: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

name: item_ogre_axe
des_item: You grow stronger just by holding it.

name: item_blade_of_alacrity
des_item: A long blade imbued with time magic.

name: item_staff_of_wizardry
des_item: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

name: item_ultimate_orb
des_item: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

name: item_gloves
des_item: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

name: item_lifesteal
des_item: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

method_passive.des_passive: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

name: item_ring_of_regen
des_item: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

name: item_sobi_mask
des_item: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

name: item_boots
des_item: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

name: item_gem
des_item: Not one thrall creature of the depths, Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep, Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular, Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

method_passive.des_passive: Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within its carrier's range.

name: item_cloak
des_item: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

name: item_talisman_of_evasion
des_item: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

name: item_cheese
des_item: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

method_active.des_active: Instantly restores health and mana

name: item_magic_stick
des_item: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

method_active.des_active: Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 10) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.

name: item_magic_wand
des_item: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

method_active.des_active: Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 17) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.

name: item_ghost
des_item: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

method_active.des_active: Enter ghost form, becoming immune to physical damage, yet unable to attack and taking 40% extra magic damage.

name: item_clarity
des_item: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

method_active.des_active: Restores mana to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

name: item_enchanted_mango
des_item: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

method_active.des_active: Consume the mango to instantly restore 150 mana. Hold Control to use Enchanted Mango on an allied hero.

name: item_flask
des_item: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

method_active.des_active: Restores health to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

name: item_dust
des_item: One may hide visage, but never volume

method_active.des_active: Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

name: item_bottle
des_item: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

method_active.des_active: Consumes a charge to restore Health and Mana over time. Healing stops if attacked. Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain. If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30% slower.

name: item_ward_observer
des_item: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

method_active.des_active: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives vision of its surrounding area to your team. Lasts 6 minutes. Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

name: item_ward_sentry
des_item: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

method_active.des_active: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range. Lasts 4 minutes. Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

name: item_tango
des_item: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

method_active.des_active: Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health. Comes with 4 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

name: item_courier
des_item: Losing the courier is punishable by death

method_active.des_active: Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.

name: item_tpscroll
des_item: What a hero truly needs.

method_active.des_active: Teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

name: item_travel_boots
des_item: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

method_active.des_active: Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes.

name: item_travel_boots_2
des_item: Winged boots that grant omnipresence

method_active.des_active: Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes

name: item_phase_boots
des_item: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

method_active.des_active: Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. The increased movement speed is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged

name: item_demon_edge
des_item: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

name: item_eagle
des_item: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

name: item_reaver
des_item: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

name: item_relic
des_item: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of

name: item_hyperstone
des_item: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

name: item_ring_of_health
des_item: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling�s corpse

name: item_void_stone
des_item: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

name: item_mystic_staff
des_item: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

name: item_energy_booster
des_item: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

name: item_point_booster
des_item: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

name: item_vitality_booster
des_item: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

name: item_power_treads
des_item: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

method_active.des_active: Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

name: item_hand_of_midas
des_item: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

method_active.des_active: Kills a non-hero target for 200 gold and 1.85x experience. Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

name: item_oblivion_staff
des_item: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

name: item_pers
des_item: A gem that grants heart to the bearer

name: item_poor_mans_shield
des_item: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

method_passive.des_passive: Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a 50% chance to block damage from creeps.

name: item_bracer
des_item: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

name: item_wraith_band
des_item: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it
place: Bought From A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it

name: item_null_talisman
des_item: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

name: item_mekansm
des_item: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

method_active.des_active: Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.

name: item_vladmir
des_item: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants lifesteal, health regeneration, mana regeneration, bonus attack damage, and armor to allies in a 900 radius. The lifesteal percentage is based on whether the hero affected by the aura is melee or ranged.

name: item_flying_courier
des_item: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

method_active.des_active: Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.

name: item_buckler
des_item: Buckler

method_active.des_active: Gives +2 armor to all allied units in a 900 radius. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

name: item_ring_of_basilius
des_item: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect. Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

name: item_pipe
des_item: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

method_active.des_active: Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all allies in a 900 radius.

method_passive.des_passive: Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance in a 900 radius.

name: item_urn_of_shadows
des_item: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

method_active.des_active: Heals health over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero. Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.v

name: item_headdress
des_item: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

method_passive.des_passive: Restores health to allies in a 900 unit radius.

name: item_sheepstick
des_item: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

method_active.des_active: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.

name: item_orchid
des_item: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

method_active.des_active: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30%.

name: item_bloodthorn
des_item: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

method_active.des_active: Silences a target for 5 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30%. All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and land a crit on impact.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

name: item_echo_sabre
des_item: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

method_passive.des_passive: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 0.6 second 100% movement speed slow on each strike.

name: item_cyclone
des_item: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

method_active.des_active: Sweeps a target unit up into cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

name: item_aether_lens
des_item: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

method_passive.des_passive: Increases spell cast range by 220.

name: item_force_staff
des_item: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

method_active.des_active: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to instantly cast Force on yourself.

name: item_hurricane_pike
des_item: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

method_active.des_active: When used on an enemy, it pushes you both away from each other 450 units each, and allows you to attack the target without range restrictions for 4 attacks for a maximum of 5 seconds. Grants 100 Attack Speed during the attacks. Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

method_passive.des_passive: ncreases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

name: item_dagon
des_item: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

method_active.des_active: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

name: item_dagon_2
des_item: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

method_active.des_active: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

des_item: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

des_item: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_dagon_5
des_item: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

method_active.des_active: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

name: item_necronomicon
des_item: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

method_active.des_active: abSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3.ccccc

name: item_necronomicon_2
des_item: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

method_active.des_active: abSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3.ccccc

name: item_necronomicon_3
des_item: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

method_active.des_active: abSummons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3.ccccc

name: item_ultimate_scepter
des_item: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

method_passive.des_passive: Upgrades the ultimate and some abilities of certain heroes.

name: item_refresher
des_item: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

method_active.des_active: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

name: item_assault
des_item: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases the armor of nearby enemies.

name: item_heart
des_item: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

method_passive.des_passive: Restores a percentage of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.

name: item_black_king_bar
des_item: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

method_active.des_active: Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.

name: item_aegis
des_item: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

method_passive.des_passive: Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).

name: item_shivas_guard
des_item: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

method_active.des_active: Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

method_passive.des_passive: Reduces the attack speed of all enemies in a 900 radius.

name: item_bloodstone
des_item: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

method_active.des_active: Instantly causes you to die.

method_passive.des_passive: Begins with 12 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.

name: item_sphere
des_item: The fThis magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

method_active.des_active: Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit.

method_passive.des_passive: Blocks most targeted spells once every 13 seconds

name: item_lotus_orb
des_item: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

method_active.des_active: Applies a shield to the target unit which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Dispels negative buffs when applied.

name: item_vanguard
des_item: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants the wielder a 50% chance to block damage from incoming attacks based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: item_crimson_guard
des_item: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

method_active.des_active: abcGrant nearby allied heroes and buildings a 100% chance to block 60 damage from each incoming attack, along with 2 armor. Lasts 12 seconds.cccc

method_passive.des_passive: Grants the wielder a 50% chance to block damage from incoming attacks based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: item_blade_mail
des_item: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

method_active.des_active: Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4.5 seconds.

name: item_soul_booster
des_item: Regain lost courage.

name: item_hood_of_defiance
des_item: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

method_active.des_active: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.

name: item_rapier
des_item: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

name: item_monkey_king_bar
des_item: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun.

name: item_radiance
des_item: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

method_passive.des_passive: When active, scorches nearby enemies for 60 damage per second and blinds them, causing them to miss 17% of their attacks.

name: item_butterfly
des_item: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

method_active.des_active: Trade evasion for 35% additional movement speed for 4 seconds.

name: item_greater_crit
des_item: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

name: item_basher
des_item: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

name: item_bfury
des_item: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

method_active.des_active: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.

method_passive.des_passive: Deals a percent of attack damage in an area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

name: item_manta
des_item: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

method_active.des_active: Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee heroes have a 30 second cooldown on this ability, while for Ranged heroes the cooldown is 45 seconds.

name: item_lesser_crit
des_item: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

name: item_dragon_lance
des_item: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

method_passive.des_passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

name: item_armlet
des_item: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

method_active.des_active: When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains 45 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

name: item_invis_sword
des_item: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

method_active.des_active: Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 14 seconds.

name: item_silver_edge
des_item: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

method_active.des_active: Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move 20% faster and can move through units. Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus damage to the target, disable their passive abilities, and reduce their damage output.

name: item_sange_and_yasha
des_item: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

name: item_satanic
des_item: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

method_active.des_active: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.5 seconds.

method_passive.des_passive: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

name: item_mjollnir
des_item: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

method_active.des_active: Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and additional enemies.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between targets, dealing magical damage to each.

name: item_skadi
des_item: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

method_passive.des_passive: Each attack slows the movement and attack speed of the target. The duration of the slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: item_sange
des_item: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

method_passive.des_passive: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5 seconds. The slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: item_helm_of_the_dominator
des_item: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

method_active.des_active: Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 425. If a dominated creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.

method_passive.des_passive: Increases health regen by 10 and attack speed by 10.

name: item_maelstrom
des_item: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harn

method_passive.des_passive: Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between targets, dealing magical damage to each.

name: item_desolator
des_item: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

method_passive.des_passive: Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.

name: item_yasha
des_item: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

name: item_mask_of_madness
des_item: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

method_active.des_active: Gives 110 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but reduces your armor by 5 and silences you. Lasts 8 seconds.

method_passive.des_passive: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

name: item_diffusal_blade
des_item: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

method_active.des_active: Targets an enemy, removing buffs from the target and slowing it for 4 seconds.

method_passive.des_passive: Each attack burns 50 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.

name: item_diffusal_blade_2
des_item: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

method_active.des_active: Targets an enemy, removing buffs from the target and slowing it for 4 seconds.

method_passive.des_passive: Each attack burns 50 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.

name: item_ethereal_blade
des_item: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

method_active.des_active: Launches a projectile which converts the target to ethereal form, increasing any incoming magic damage they take, while rendering them immune to physical damage and unable to attack. Can be cast on self. If the target is an enemy, it is also slowed, and takes 2x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage. Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.

name: item_soul_ring
des_item: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

method_active.des_active: Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: item_arcane_boots
des_item: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

method_active.des_active: Restores mana to all allies in a 900 area around the hero.

name: item_octarine_core
des_item: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

method_passive.des_passive: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

name: item_orb_of_venom
des_item: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

method_passive.des_passive: Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing movement based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: item_blight_stone
des_item: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

method_passive.des_passive: Your attacks reduce target's armor for 8 seconds.

name: item_ancient_janggo
des_item: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

method_active.des_active: Gives bonus +25 attack speed and +13% movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.

method_passive.des_passive: Gives bonus movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.

name: item_medallion_of_courage
des_item: The bearer has no fear of combat.

method_active.des_active: If cast on an ally, increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy, reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies.

name: item_solar_crest
des_item: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

method_active.des_active: Temporarily removes the armor and evasion from Solar Crest. When cast on an ally it grants them 10 armor and 25% evasion. When cast on an enemy, it removes 10 of their armor and and grants your allies to have 25% True Strike chance on the target. Cannot target magic immune enemies.

name: item_smoke_of_deceit
des_item: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

method_active.des_active: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisibility and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.

name: item_tome_of_knowledge
des_item: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

method_active.des_active: Grants you 500 experience plus 135 per tome consumed by your team.

name: item_veil_of_discord
des_item: The headwear of corrupt magi.

method_active.des_active: Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 16 seconds.

name: item_guardian_greaves
des_item: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

method_active.des_active: Restores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative buffs from the caster.

method_passive.des_passive: Provides nearby allies with 4 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 15 health regeneration and 15 armor.

name: item_rod_of_atos
des_item: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

method_active.des_active: Roots the target for 2 seconds.

name: item_iron_talon
des_item: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

method_active.des_active: Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current health.

method_passive.des_passive: Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

name: item_abyssal_blade
des_item: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

method_active.des_active: Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

name: item_heavens_halberd
des_item: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

method_active.des_active: Prevents a target from attacking. Lasts 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5.5 seconds on ranged targets.

method_passive.des_passive: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5 seconds. The slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: item_ring_of_aquila
des_item: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

method_passive.des_passive: Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect. Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

name: item_tranquil_boots
des_item: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

method_passive.des_passive: Whenever you attack or are attacked, the 14 health regeneration and 25 Movement Speed are lost for 13 seconds.

name: item_shadow_amulet
des_item: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

method_active.des_active: Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero after a 1.25 second fade time. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

name: item_glimmer_cape
des_item: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

method_active.des_active: After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit. Can be cast while channelling.
